Task Title: Design prototype based on requirements
Procure parts for building the prototype
Assemble prototype
Adjust parameters (feed and waste times, accumulator tank, sieve bed and product tank sizes, etc)
Mount equipment in a suitable enclosure to minimise overall size
Test prototype under different operating conditions
Identify an ambulance for testing
Design an evaluation plan including data to be collected
Orient the driver and agree on how and where the equipment will be installed in the vehicle
Install the equipment and ensure that it is operating as expected
Evaluate the unit over a period of X patients
Review the results of the evaluation
Modify the design to incoporate any required changes
Implement the changes on prototypes
Retest prototypes under different operating conditions
Order parts to assemble three complete version-2 prototypes
Assemble two additional prototypes
Test prototypes under different operating conditions
Identify two additional ambulances to be used for testing
Install all three prototypes in ambulances
Evaluate all three prototypes over a period of X patient transfers
Develop a final report in the evaliation
Publish the designs as open access
